title: What is the best alternative to a GoPro? - Quora

response.answer_text: I like my DJI Osmo Pocket a lot, but it’s kinda fragile with a gimbal for stabilization. I like it for it’s 9-panel pano mode, lets me get a whole half a room with little distortion. I see where others like their Osmo Actions, and there are lots of comparisons directly with GoPro. It stabilizes images by getting a larger image through its very large lens, then applying digital stabilization. The demos they post of extreme action look really smooth. I don’t have one, need camera drones, not action cameras, but I’m brand-loyal to DJI, would buy this first if I needed a rugged camera. Either of the little Osmo cameras can get spectacular images, but the Action’s got a larger lens and you can drop it, go swimming with it, put it on a harness with your dog… There are lots of cheaper GoPro-alternatives that somebody might swear are just fine after good experience with it. It really doesn’t take a lot to make an image look good for a browser or a smartphone, and I’ve been delighted with lots of cheaper alternatives, wish I could recommend a cheap action camera. Lots of them show up at Amazon or eBay and the feedback might help you pick a good-enough camera cheap. The Osmo Action is only reasonably priced for what it is, there must be some cheaper…

For best as an alternative for the GoPro without spending much then I would suggest to go with the Yi 4K or the SJCAM SJ8 Pro action cameras. Yi 4K Action Camera  It is lightweight, easy to use action camera which is overall a good and has same like features to the GoPro camera. You can capture a 4K/30fps video with 12MP of max resolution for images. The best part is its built-in Stabilization that many camera don’t have for a stable video. Along with these specs, there are lot more other features and functions that you can explore having it. SJCAM SJ8 Pro  Another light-weighted, with built-in stabilization for stable video recording. You can capture 4K/60fps with its max resolution of 12MP. It provides a clear images and up to 8x magnification and a wide 170-degree view angle for better coverage. Overall, this two action camera is a perfect piece or say camera when you are looking for a budget friendly and as an alternative for the GoPros.
